akn:section.akn:heading: Symbol of office of Sergeant at Arms

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 5603. Symbol of office of Sergeant at Arms The symbol of his office shall be the mace, which shall be borne by him while enforcing order on the floor. (Oct. 1, 1890, ch. 1256, § 2, 26 Stat. 645.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was formerly classified to section 79 of this title prior to editorial reclassification and renumbering as this section.
